```{r}
library(rorcid)
library(dplyr)
b <- works("0000-0002-3813-7155")
pubs <- tibble(title = b$title.title.value, 
               year = b$`publication-date.year.value`,
               journal = b$`journal-title.value`,
               doi = b$url.value) |>
  arrange(year)
save(pubs, file="pubs.rda")
```

```{r}

library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
load("pubs.rda")
kable(pubs)
```
